rWishart
  • @ bearstatistics.com
  • Reference

Psuedo Wishart Helper Function

Psuedo Wishart Helper Function

PsuedoWishart(df, Sigma, covariance = FALSE)

Arguments

df

degrees of freedom
Sigma

Covariance matrix
covariance

should covariance matrix be generated (X / df)

Value

list or array of random wishart matrices

Examples

PsuedoWishart(5, diag(1, 20))
#>             [,1]       [,2]       [,3]        [,4]        [,5]       [,6]
